title: Famous Siblings
description: Well-known sibling groups in history and entertainment

questions.question: Brothers Orville and Wilbur Wright are best known for achieving what historic feat in 1903?
Which famous brothers composed the music for classic songs like 'Rhapsody in Blue' and 'I Got Rhythm'?
The Brontë sisters — Charlotte, Emily, and Anne — were all famous for their work in which field?
Brothers Jacob and Wilhelm are better known by which surname, famous for their collection of fairy tales?
Which siblings starred together in the classic film 'White Christmas' (1954)?
options: None — it starred Bing Crosby and Danny Kaye

questions.question: John, Robert, and Ted Kennedy all served in which branch of the U.S. government?
Venus and Serena Williams are famous siblings in which sport?
Which Marx brother was known for his silent comedy, curly wig, and playing the harp?
The Everly Brothers, Don and Phil, were famous for harmonizing in which music genre?
Brothers John and Hank are famous on YouTube under which shared surname?
Which pair of brothers founded a major film studio known for producing 'Looney Tunes' and countless classic movies?
Legendary sibling act The Andrews Sisters were most popular during which era?
In the Bible, which brothers are known for the first murder, when one killed the other out of jealousy?
The Ringling Brothers, who created a famous circus, hailed from which U.S. state?
Which legendary acting siblings starred in the 1989 film 'Rain Man'?
options: None — it starred Dustin Hoffman and Tom Cruise
